algebraic_word_problem: Two workers can complete a task in 5 hours working together. Worker A alone can complete it in 8 hours. How long will Worker B take to complete the task alone?
step_by_step_solution:
Rate of Worker A = 1/8 jobs/hour
Let Worker B's rate = 1/x jobs/hour
Total rate = 1/5 jobs/hour
1/8 + 1/x = 1/5
Solve for x = 13.33 hours
